name: Dicehead (iamcheeze)
description:
Made in 1.5 days for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

CONTROLS:

WASD / ARROWS - Move

W / UP ARROW / SPACE - Jump

J / SHIFT - DASH

PLOT:

Uh oh! Cuphe- I MEAN Dicehead has found himself in quite the predicament! The Dev- I MEAN Suspicious Mysterious Very Spooky Figure of Shadows has trapped in him in an eternal hell in his casino! Try to Survive as Long As You Can!

CREDITS:

Everything else except the music: 

IAMCHEEZE

Music:

THEMIDIMAN

You can find his stuff here ^^: https://twitter.com/TheMIDIMan1
